Title: A Home-Cooked Meal
Description:
Black dragon whelps need to grow up to be big and strong. Our hatchling here seems quite small, so I believe she will require something hearty and nutritious to help her along her way.

Roast duck is not only good for your stamina, but also your brain. I think it would be the perfect meal for our young hatchling.
ObjectivesText: Gather Roast Duck Delight for the Obsidian Whelp. This can be crafted via the cooking profession or purchased from the auction house.
